anns.prefix: Conclusions By comparing the specificity of induction of VanX and VanY peptidases in three different soil-dwelling actinomycetes, we confirm that S. coelicolor has a VanB-phenotype responding to vancomycin but not to teicoplanin or to
S. coelicolor does not produce any GPA but possessing resistance genes confers it a selective advantage since it shares the ecological niche (soil) with many other
anns.postfix: actinomycetes.

anns.prefix: Interestingly, by a culture-independent approach using molecular probes, it has been recently estimated that the frequency of encountering a
anns.postfix: producer in soil is from 2.5 to 5 times higher than for a teicoplanin-like producing actinomycete [37].

anns.prefix: Interestingly, by a culture-independent approach using molecular probes, it has been recently estimated that the frequency of encountering a vancomycin-type producer in soil is from 2.5 to 5 times higher than for a
anns.postfix: producing actinomycete [37].

anns.prefix: In contrast, the
anns.postfix: producer A. teichomyceticus is highly and constitutively resistant to all the GPAs, including its own product.

anns.prefix: On the contrary, lower resistance in N. gerenzanensis is induced either by
anns.postfix: or teicoplanins, and is based on the action of a VanY carboxypeptidase, which in many enterococci and staphylococci plays an unessential and ancillary role in the presence of VanHAX system [27].

anns.prefix: Evidently, although producing structurally similar
anns.postfix: , A. teichomyceticus and N. gerenzanensis do not share the same self-resistant mechanism.

anns.prefix: Previous comparative analyses of their biosynthetic GPA clusters indicated that many
anns.postfix: biosynthetic genes are more related to vancomycin-type genes than to their teicoplanin homologs [38].

anns.prefix: Previous comparative analyses of their biosynthetic GPA clusters indicated that many A40926 biosynthetic genes are more related to
anns.postfix: genes than to their teicoplanin homologs [38].

anns.prefix: The production of
anns.postfix: and teicoplanin are most likely the result of a convergent evolution rather than originating from the same common ancestor.

anns.prefix: The production of A40926 and

anns.prefix: Additionally, since the genes involved in
anns.postfix: resistance in pathogens have been recruited from the different antibiotic-producing actinomycetes, gene swapping among different GPA-producing actinomycetes is proving to be useful for unveiling the specificity of regulation and predicting the evolution of future resistance gene combinations emerging in pathogens.

anns.prefix: When S. coelicolor parental strain was grown in the presence of subinhibitory concentrations of vancomycin (10 µg/mL), teicoplanin (0.75 µg/mL), and A40926 (0.75 µg/mL), only vancomycin induced an increase in

anns.prefix: Introduction Glycopeptide
anns.postfix: (GPAs) are drugs of last resort for treating severe infections caused by Gram-positive pathogens such as Staphylococcus aureus (SA), Enterococcus spp., and Clostridioides difficile [1].

anns.prefix: Introduction Glycopeptide antibiotics (GPAs) are drugs of last resort for
anns.postfix: severe infections caused by Gram-positive pathogens such as Staphylococcus aureus (SA), Enterococcus spp., and Clostridioides difficile [1].

anns.prefix: Clinically important GPAs include first-generation vancomycin and teicoplanin—which, although discovered many decades ago, continue to be extensively used in clinical practice—and second-generation telavancin, dalbavancin, and oritavancin, which were recently approved for clinical use for their increased
anns.postfix: potency and superior pharmacokinetic properties [2,3,4].

anns.prefix: In fact, the superior
anns.postfix: potency of teicoplanin-like molecules is due to membrane anchoring of the hydrophobic tail, which strengthens the bond to membrane-localized lipid II [7,8].

anns.prefix: Additionally, Dong et al. [9] demonstrated that lipidation is the key functional difference between vancomycin and teicoplanin related to their differing abilities of inducing a GPA
anns.postfix: response in enterococci.

anns.prefix: More recently Kwun and Hong [10], using the harmless actinomycete Streptomyces coelicolor as a model
anns.postfix: system, confirmed that teicoplanin-like derivatives are poor inducers of GPA resistance, and a lack of induction accounts for the susceptibility to these molecules.

anns.prefix: Since it is widely believed that GPA
anns.postfix: mechanisms are ultimately derived from GPA-producing actinomycetes, which use them to avoid suicide during antibiotic production [2,14], in this paper we investigated the specificity of induction of GPA resistance in teicoplanin- and A40926-producing actinomycetes.

anns.prefix: Since it is widely believed that GPA resistance mechanisms are ultimately derived from GPA-producing actinomycetes, which use them to avoid suicide during
anns.postfix: production [2,14], in this paper we investigated the specificity of induction of GPA resistance in teicoplanin- and A40926-producing actinomycetes.

anns.prefix: As a control, we used the well-characterized
anns.postfix: model S. coelicolor, which does not synthesize any GPA but does possess a van gene cluster conferring inducible resistance to vancomycin but not to teicoplanin, showing the features of the VanB phenotype [10,16,21].

anns.postfix: mechanisms are ultimately derived from GPA-producing actinomycetes, which use them to avoid suicide during antibiotic production [2,14], in this paper we investigated the specificity of induction of GPA resistance in teicoplanin- and A40926-producing actinomycetes.

anns.prefix: To shed light on the specificity of induction of GPA resistance in N. gerenzanensis, we compared the VanY activity in N. gerenzanensis and in its recombinant strain
anns.postfix: when grown in the absence or presence of GPAs (Figure 2).

anns.prefix: As expected, MICs of GPAs measured on
anns.postfix: after 48 and 72 h of growth in the presence of A40926 increased, as reported in Table S2 of Supplementary Material.

anns.prefix: Surprisingly, the membrane-associated VanY activity in
anns.postfix: was significantly induced only by vancomycin, and its detection was delayed in comparison to the parental strain, reaching its maximum value after 96 h of growth (Figure 2).

anns.prefix: Intriguingly, these data suggest that swapping heterologous
anns.postfix: genes in N. gerenzanensis pST30 did alter the specificity of induction of the homologous VanY activity, although the heterologous VanX activity responded to induction by the three GPAs as the VanY activity did in the parental strain.

anns.prefix: Intriguingly, these data suggest that swapping heterologous A. teichomyceticus genes in
anns.postfix: did alter the specificity of induction of the homologous VanY activity, although the heterologous VanX activity responded to induction by the three GPAs as the VanY activity did in the parental strain.

anns.prefix: Irrespective of this finding, further investigations on the still-unknown regulatory genes controlling GPA resistance in
anns.postfix: are needed to better explain these diverse responses to GPA induction.

anns.prefix: On the contrary, lower resistance in
anns.postfix: is induced either by vancomycin or teicoplanins, and is based on the action of a VanY carboxypeptidase, which in many enterococci and staphylococci plays an unessential and ancillary role in the presence of VanHAX system [27].

anns.prefix: Evidently, although producing structurally similar GPAs,

anns.prefix: Although the identity and the role of the putative VanRS-like two-component signal transduction system in
anns.postfix: needs to be investigated, the results of gene swapping between A. teichomyceticus and N. gerenzanensis indicate that cross-talking of the two-component systems is possible, as previously demonstrated in other actinomycetes [21,32].

anns.prefix: Although the identity and the role of the putative VanRS-like two-component signal transduction system in N. gerenzanensis needs to be investigated, the results of gene swapping between
anns.postfix: and N. gerenzanensis indicate that cross-talking of the two-component systems is possible, as previously demonstrated in other actinomycetes [21,32].

anns.prefix: Determining the sequences and the protein structures of the putative VanRS two-component system in
anns.postfix: may help to confirm that the inducer specificity is determined by the origin of VanRS proteins and may provide additional evidence on the role of GPAs as VanS effector ligands.
